title: Ethiopia’s Abiy ‘humbled and thrilled’ by Nobel honour
text:
Oslo (AFP) – Ethiopian prime minister Abiy Ahmed said Friday he was “humbled and thrilled” upon learning he was the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize laureate, adding he hoped it would inspire peace efforts on his continent.

“I was so humbled and thrilled when I just heard the news,” Abiy told the Nobel committee in a phone call posted online on the Nobel Prize website, saying: “It is a prize given to Africa, given to Ethiopia”.

Abiy also said he could “imagine how the rest of Africa’s leaders would think it possible to work on peace-building processes”.
